      • attemptRegister

        public void attemptRegister()
        Attempts to register the account specified by the register form. If there are form errors (invalid email, missing fields, etc.), the errors are presented and no actual register attempt is made.

      • hideKeyboardIfNeeded

        private void hideKeyboardIfNeeded()
